document.query: ALTER TABLE `vendor_address` ADD `name` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `id`;
ALTER TABLE `vendor_address` ADD `mobile` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `name`;
ALTER TABLE `vendor_address` ADD `address_line_1` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `mobile`;
ALTER TABLE `vendor_address` ADD `address_line_2` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `address_line_1`;
ALTER TABLE `vendor_address` ADD `city` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `address_line_2`;
ALTER TABLE `vendor_address` ADD `state` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `city`;
ALTER TABLE `vendor_address` ADD `zip` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `state`;
ALTER TABLE `vendor_address` ADD `country` VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL AFTER `zip`;
